title: My boards icon is not my client icon
body:
So like I used this draven icon once and it won't show any other icons as My profile...  

HELP ME I DON'T LIKE DRAVEN ANYMORE!!!!!!

replies.body: it's just the servers being slow. i once had a summoenr icon that wasn't the one i had in my client for 2 weeks :/ Messaged support and they just said it will pass lol.
Been a long time since I had this icon on like 6 months
